titles.title: Youth Summer Jobs and Public Service Act of 2019
Youth Summer Jobs and Public Service Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to provide grants to States for summer employment programs for youth.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Youth Summer Jobs and Public Service Act of 2019
This bill directs the Department of Labor to award grants to states to help local areas with high concentrations of eligible youth to carry out summer employment programs to provide those youth with summer employment opportunities directly linked to academic and occupational learning.
